naslov: MODERNO OPREMLJENA SAMOSTOJEĆA KUĆA - KAŠTEL ŠTAFILIĆ (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Kaštel Štafilić, Kaštela, Splitsko Dalmatinska, Hrvatska, €1.100.000,00 __ Novouređena samostojeća kuća sastoji se od prizemlja i prvog kata na dobroj lokaciji u Kaštel Novom. Ukupna površina kuće je 164 M2 i okućnice 367 M2, sagrađena je 2024. godine. Sastoji se od jedne stambene jedinice, u dvorištu kuće nalazi se bazen od 28 M2, te više parking mjesta. U prizemlju kuće se nalazi kuhinja s blagovaonicom, spavaćom sobom, spremište, kupaonica i wc-e. Na prvom katu se nalaze tri spavaće sobe, kupaonica i wc,  te velika lođa. Iz prizemlja se izlazi na dvorište s bazenom, roštiljem i ljetnom kuhinjom, idealno za opuštanje i uživanje na otvorenom. Kuća je u potpunosti moderno dizajnirana sa pomno odabranim materijalima. Kuća je smještena u mirnom predjelu Kaštel Štafilića. _ Kaštel Štafilić, Kaštela, Split Dalmatia, Croatia, €1.100.000,00 __ Newly renovated detached house consists of a ground floor and first floor in a good location in Kaštel Novi. The total area of ​​the house is 164 M2 and the garden is 367 M2, it was built in 2024. It consists of one residential unit, in the courtyard of the house there is a 28 M2 swimming pool. On the ground floor of the house there is a kitchen with a dining room, a bedroom, a storage room, a bathroom and toilets. On the first floor there are three bedrooms, a bathroom and a toilet, and a large loggia. From the ground floor there is an exit to the courtyard with a swimming pool, barbecue and summer kitchen, ideal for relaxing and enjoying the outdoors. The house is completely modernly designed with carefully selected materials. The house is located in a quiet area of ​​Kaštel Štafilić. _ [Posrednička naknada za kupca iznosi 2% + PDV / Brokerage fee is 2% + VAT] Contact: IVAN ANĐELIĆ Licensed Real Estate Advisor Phone: +385-95-909-0504
